# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 0.1.x   | :white_check_mark: |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

This project relies on [Symfony components](https://symfony.com/components) for most of its features. If you suspect that the security issue is caused by Symfony, please report the issue to them as explained in https://symfony.com/security

If you find a security issues related to the bundle, you can report them in this repository using the tool provided by GitHub in [Security > Advisories](https://github.com/jolicode/MediaBundle/security/advisories).
